Detailed Description

Interface of the configuration routines for the daemon.

$Header$

Function Documentation

int kurud_configure ( char *  config_file  ) 

Reads the configuration file looking for configuration parameters. If the file name argument is NULL, the default configuration file is used.

Parameters:
[in] config_file - the configuration file to load
Returns:
KURUD_OK if successful, KURUD_ERROR otherwise.
